definition: to have no right or ability to interfere in sth/it's none of your business!

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
don’t worry about (it, him etc)/doesn’t matter/whatever/anyway
to do as one sees fit/to play it by ear (according to the circumstances)

pinyin: zheng1 yi1 zhi1 yan3 bi4 yi1 zhi1 yan3
zheng1 yi1 yan3 bi4 yi1 yan3
zheng1 zhi1 yan3 bi4 zhi1 yan3

definition: to act arbitrarily regardless of the rules/to mess with sth/to make a hash of things/to cause trouble
let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank
pinyin: chou3 hua4 shuo1 zai4 qian2 tou5

definition: to have the final say/to be the one in charge
to gesticulate while talking (idiom)/to explain by waving one's hands/to criticize or give orders summarily
